## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have used modern GMod APIs (SetNW*, not SetNetworked*)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested my changes thoroughly
- [ ] My changes do not break existing functionality
- [ ] I have checked for console errors
- [ ] I have tested in both singleplayer and multiplayer (if applicable)

### E2 Scripts (if applicable)
- [ ] Script includes proper header documentation
- [ ] Script includes wiring instructions
- [ ] Script has been tested and works correctly
- [ ] examples/README.md has been updated
